input.sentences: the kids went to the museum today
the baby was just enjoying the sun today .
the kids sat around the pond and enjoyed the day .
output.sentences: The kids were very excited to go to the museum today.
They were particularly curious of the sculptures; they looked at them with wonder.
Afterwards, their curious minds looked at the snail, wondering why the snail was so slow.
Upon being outside, the baby began to make joyful noises, making the kids even happier.
There was a pond outside the museum where the kids enjoyed the last part of their day playing in.
